Acquisition.description: Mergers, acquisitions, asset purchases, or business combinations

Customer Event.description: Major customer contracts, partnerships, or customer-related announcements

Personnel Change.description: Changes in executive leadership, board members, or key personnel

Financial Event.description: Earnings announcements, dividend declarations, financial results

Regulatory/Legal Event.description: Legal proceedings, SEC investigations, regulatory approvals/denials, compliance issues

Corporate Restructuring.description: Spin-offs, divestitures, bankruptcies, reorganizations, subsidiary sales

Capital Market Event.description: Stock offerings, debt issuance, credit agreements, share buybacks, dividend changes

Product/Service Event.description: Major product launches, recalls, regulatory approvals (especially pharma/biotech)

Strategic Alliance.description: Joint ventures, strategic partnerships, licensing deals (broader than customer events)

Scheduling Event.description: Scheduled events like earnings calls, meetings, or conferences

Other.description: Events that don't fit into other categories
